documentation.text: @notice Keeps track of total projects count
@notice An event emitted when a Project is been created
@notice An event emitted when a user grants funds to a specific project
@notice Stores a record of all the registered projects
@notice Stores a record of all the grants made
@notice Keeps track of tokens seeded to the rewardPool
@notice Keeps tracks of the paid rewards

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._endTime: : End time of when the crowdfund will end
params._startTime: : Timestamp of when the crowdfund will start

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

rewardsPaid(address).notice: Keeps tracks of the paid rewards

rewardsPool(uint256).notice: Keeps track of tokens seeded to the rewardPool
